title: South Goa Treetop Escape with Daily Anytime Breakfast & Daily Drinks
description:
Nestled in the hills of the Western Ghats, The Postcard Hideaway Netravali is a luxury hotel tucked away in South Goa. With 20 ultra-luxe rooms surrounded by lush greenery, this peaceful haven is spread on 20 acres of serenity. Elegant rooms with modern amenities and a large patio where you can observe the surrounding nature make you feel like you are living a dream in the tranquil forest, away from the hustle and bustle of the city. An open-air jacuzzi strips you of all worries and a session in the spa with a number of wellness therapies to choose from revitalises you (extra charges apply).

Delicious meals, drinks and yoga sessions in the verdant hills give a different twist to this Goan holiday. A plethora of fun experiences like nature exploration walks, treks to Savri waterfall, surfing lessons at Agonda/Palolim Beach and much more can be arranged if you wish to enhance the fun with all kinds of activities (extra charges may apply). If you're looking for a detox from busy life in the city, this is the perfect holiday for you. Here, you can rest, relax, rejuvenate and rewind.

title: South Goa & Karnataka: Luxe Postcard Escape with Daily Anytime Breakfast & Daily Drinks
description:
Experience the unique beauty of South Goa and Maravanthe coast in Karnataka by staying at two Postcard properties, a boutique collection of hotels by leaders trained in the art of slow luxury. With transformative experiences and the local community at the heart of The Postcard collection, you can expect intimate service as you encounter UNESCO World Heritage-listed buildings, beautiful beaches and breathtaking wildlife on your travels. Discover a whole new side of South Goa at The Postcard Hideaway Netravali, a 20-acre expanse that features just 20 treetop-inspired rooms hidden within the lush greenery of Netravali. The Postcard on the Arabian Sea is a beach-lovers paradise for it offers merely 9 luxury rooms scattered across a secluded stretch of coastline in Maravanthe, Karnataka.

Whether you want to get away from the chaos of cities and enjoy a quiet holiday with your family or crave a beach holiday, you can unwind in total tranquility at both the Postcard hotels in Goa and Karnataka. Plus,  each hotel offers unique experiences that are true to its surroundings, giving guests a sense of the neighborhood and the destination in a way never seen before. The hotels are sustainably made and food is made with fresh local ingredients. Set breakfast hours and sugary welcome drinks are things of the past; in their place, The Postcard Collection puts emphasis on authentic local experiences - from food, to design, to artisanal welcome cocktails, to defining your own check-in and check-out hours and immersions within the local community.
